TextView.android:text:
ADB on PC: 1) Enable Developer options. 2) Turn on USB debugging. 3) Connect to PC and run: adb shell pm grant com.onestop android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
Shizuku: 1) Install Shizuku. Start the service (ADB or root). 2) In Shizuku, grant permission to One Stop. 3) Open the app and use the toggle.
ashell (App Shell): 1) Install aShell from Play Store. 2) Run aShell with Shizuku service running. 3) Execute: pm grant com.onestop android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
